product.name: PUR-DOWN Comforter
product.long_description:
Our lofty Pur-Down™ comforters are machine washable, fast drying and hypoallergenic.  No-shift construction provides even warmth.  Choose three levels of warmth for your ideal comfort.

Featuring luxurious 700-fill-power down for superior loft and long-lasting quality.  These comforters are hypoallergenic, machine washable and fast-drying with pur-down™ antimicrobial fill.  Features corner loops.  If you choose to use a duvet, you can attach duvet ties to corner loops to hold comforter in place.

  • Light Warmth
    For warm sleepers.  Ultra soft, 400 thread count, 100% sateen cotton cover with no shift  14” diamond box construction provides even distribution of warmth.
    Available in Twin, Queen, and Eastern/California King
  • Medium Warmth
    For most sleepers. Ultra soft, 400 thread count, 100% sateen cotton cover with no shift  16” diamond box construction provides even distribution of warmth.
    Available in Twin, Queen, and Eastern/California King
  • Extra Warmth
    For chilly sleepers. Ultra soft, 400 thread count, 100% sateen cotton cover with no shift  18” diamond box construction provides even distribution of warmth.
    Available in Queen, and Eastern/California King

Sizing;
Twin: 68” x 88”
Queen: 88” x 96”
Eastern King: 107” x 96”
California King: 100” x 100”

Poduct care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach or dry clean.

Filled and finished in the USA of imported materials
10 Year limited warranty

product.name: Supima Cotton Sheet Set
product.meta_description: Developed with the highest quality Supima Cotton, Sleep Numbers Supima Sheet Set has a unique softness and breathability.

product.name: Lyocell Ultra Pillowcase Set
product.meta_description: Find the Sleep Number 's highest quality Lyocell Ultra Pillowcase Sets, developed with durable fibers to ensure comfortable and long lasting pillowcases.

product.name: Lyocell Ultra Sheet Set
product.meta_description: Find the Sleep Number 's highest quality Lyocell Ultra Sheets Sets, developed with durable fibers to ensure comfortable and long lasting pillowcases.

data.html:
Soft, breathable lyocell blend offers conforming comfort all night long. Now with ExactFit sheet design for a flexible fit that moves with you. 300-thread-count sateen weave for luxurious softness. Fits any mattress up to 15 inches.

Designed and crafted in the USA.

Our Lyocell Ultra sheets are proudly designed at Sleep Number headquarters in Minneapolis, MN. Made from imported materials, they’re then cut and sewn in the USA by a family-owned company with more than 30 years of expertise.

Includes

Sheet set includes one flat sheet, one fitted sheet and two pillowcases. Split King contains two Twin Extra-Long fitted sheets. 

Learn more. See our How-to videos.

Find the ideal bedding combination. Mix and match colors using Bedding Planner.

Fitted sheet: 68% lyocell, 27% cotton, 5% elastane

Flat sheet and pillowcases: 70% lyocell, 30% cotton

Made in the USA of fabric imported from China.

Machine wash gentle cycle in cold water with mild detergent. Do not use chlorine bleach. Tumble dry on low heat or line dry.

Do not pour detergent directly on sheets and avoid chlorine bleach or detergents with added bleach or whiteners.

Do not use fabric softener, overload washing machine, or wash with non-bedding items. These increase friction, which can break down fabrics or cause pilling.

Drying
Remove from dryer while slightly damp to prevent wrinkles. Do not use dryer sheets, as they may weaken and break down the yarns.

Storage
Store sheets in a cool, dry, well-ventilated area. Do not store in plastic containers as this may cause fabric to discolor.

FYI
Certain hair and skincare products may discolor sheets and pillowcases or cause pilling.
STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX certification keeps you and your family safe from harmful substances. Label ID and test institute: 18.HUS.47931 HOHENSTEIN HTTI
